items_functionality module

items_functionality.burn_trees(grid, x, y)[source]

Activates the flamethrower functionality to burn trees.

Parameters:

  • grid (list) – The current game map grid

  • x (int) – The x coordinate of the tree that will be burned

  • y (int) – The y coordinate of the tree that will be burned

Process:

The function loops through all the trees that is found in orthogonal direction until it cannot find one.

Returns:

The updated grid with burned trees removed

Return type:

list

items_functionality.cut_tree(grid, x, y)[source]

Activates the axe functionality to cut trees.

Parameters:

  • grid (list) – The current game map grid

  • x (int) – The x coordinate of the tree that will be cut

  • y (int) – The y coordinate of the tree that will be cut

Process:

Assigns the grid[x][y] to be a “.” which makes that element of the grid to be walkable.

Returns:

The updated grid with the removed tree.

Return type:

list
